plot: Cinepoem. A girl goes out to her back yard and starts digging a hole in the ground. As she goes deeper, she finds objects and memories buried and forgotten.
title: El agujero
plot_es: Cinepoem. A girl goes out to her back yard and starts digging a hole in the ground. As she goes deeper, she finds objects and memories buried and forgotten.
plot_en: Cinepoem. A girl goes out to her back yard and starts digging a hole in the ground. As she goes deeper, she finds objects and memories buried and forgotten.
